_header: What this file is: Machine-readable manifest listing every icon in the master set and metadata used by build scripts and consumers.
Who should edit it: Icon Owner or Design System Lead (small additions by maintainers ok).
When to update (example): Add a new manifest entry when you add a new SVG into icons/svgs/.
Who must approve changes: Design System Lead & Engineering Lead.
description: Manifest for the canonical SVG icon library. Consumers and scripts should read this file to create registries, components, or sprite mappings.

icons.name: arrow-right
icons.notes: Use for actions that navigate forward.

icons.name: close
icons.notes: Use for dismiss and close actions. Prefer accessible label via aria-label.
